name: Landing Roll
text: You have learned the technique of rolling safely away when an enemy trips you.
benefit: If you are tripped, you can spend an immediate action to move 5 feet without provoking an attack of opportunity. This does not count as taking a 5-foot step. You fall prone after this movement.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to stand up as part of your immediate action after you move. Standing up provokes attacks of opportunity.
text_zh: 你知道如何安全地离开一个对你进行绊摔的敌人。
benefit_zh: 当你被绊摔，你可以花费直觉动作远离对你进行绊摔的敌人5尺。这个移动不计入5尺快步。你在移动完毕后才会倒地。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在直觉移动后作为直觉动作一部分起身。起身会引发借机攻击。
